A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The script is poorly written\, and the production is being really condescendent towards its audience by showing a mere eye candy to hide a subversive sexist agenda; and yes\, this type of feminism is sexist as it portrays men as obsolete fools in need of a woman to show them the way. It betrays my beliefs of gender equality and I truly despise any type of sexism.
